official_title: A resolution relating to a Citation of Contempt.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Directs the Speaker of the House to certify this resolution, setting forth additional facts pertinent to the contempt citation of Anne M (Gorsuch) Burford, to the United States Attorney for the District of Columbia.

titles.title: A resolution relating to a Citation of Contempt.
